Stress echo shows whether you have decreased blood flow to your heart (a sign of coronary heart disease).",NHLBI,Heart Murmur
What are the treatments for Heart Murmur ?,"A heart murmur isn't a disease. It's an extra or unusual sound heard during the heartbeat. Thus, murmurs themselves don't require treatment. However, if an underlying condition is causing a heart murmur, your doctor may recommend treatment for that condition.
                
Innocent (Harmless) Heart Murmurs
